Event.Message: Idle power management features on processor %1 are disabled due to a firmware problem. Check with the computer manufacturer for updated firmware.
Performance power management features on processor %1 are disabled due to a firmware problem. Check with the computer manufacturer for updated firmware.
Throttle power management features on processor %1 are disabled due to a firmware problem. Check with the computer manufacturer for updated firmware.

Processor %1 exposes the following:
%2 idle state(s) %3 performance state(s) %4 throttle state(s)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Processor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IdleStateCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PerfStateCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ThrottleStateCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="IdleState" count="IdleStateCount"> <data name="Type" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> <struct name="PerfState" count="PerfStateCount"> <data name="Frequency" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PercentOfMax" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> </template>

Event.Message: Some processor idle power management features have been disabled due to a known firmware problem. Check with the computer manufacturer for updated firmware.
Some processor performance power management features have been disabled due to a known firmware problem. Check with the computer manufacturer for updated firmware.
The speed of processor %1 is being limited by system firmware. The processor has been in this reduced performance state for %2 seconds since the last report.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Processor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CapDurationInSeconds" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PpcChanges" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TpcChanges" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The speed of processor %1 is being limited by system firmware. The processor has been in this reduced performance state for %2 seconds since the last report.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Processor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CapDurationInSeconds" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PpcChanges" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TpcChanges" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
